Main.title: Dedicated
Main.subtitle: to expanding
Main.secontext: Taxus is your provider of bespoke business solutions for IT. The best synergy of legal, financial, and marketing expertise! We provide a one-stop-shop service from company registration to contract drafting

SectionFirstTexts.expertiseText: We help businesses with company formation, mergers and acquisitions, contract drafting and review, and other corporate matters. We have a deep understanding of the legal and regulatory frameworks in various countries and provide our clients with advice on the best course of action.

SectionSecondTexts.expertiseText: We help IT businesses protect their intellectual property rights, including trademarks, patents, and copyrights. We also provide guidance on licensing and franchising agreements, and other IP-related matters.

SectionThirdTexts.expertiseText: We help businesses navigate the complex world of banking and finance, including opening current and merchant accounts, alternative payment methos (APMs), crypto payments, and other financial matters.

SectionFourTexts.expertiseText: We help IT businesses expand their operations internationally, including setting up subsidiaries, joint ventures, and other business structures. We provide advice on regulatory compliance, tax planning, and other international business matters.

firstTexts.serveMainTitle: The areas of our expertise are as diverse as the verticals of IT business are

SectionSecondTexts.text7: IT out staff and outsource companies

servicesSection.sectionTitle: We realize your IT business idea in legal and financial structure

Services.text1: We ensure the processes of setting up and maintenance of a company, as well as search for local personnel, sale of ready-made companies, and liquidations.
Services.text2: We assist in opening both bank and EMI accounts, as well as getting corporate cards and even LEI numbers for investors.
Services.text3: Some businesses are under specific state regulations. We accompany you while getting Gaming licenses, EMI licenses and Crypto licenses.
Services.text4: The full scope of services relating to merchant account opening with reliable payment systems, PCI DSS certifications, chargeback prevention and KYC verifications for your end-users.
Services.text5: We take all the hassle of preparation and submission of reports, accounting, and audit procedures. We keep an eye on deadlines for VAT, OSS, and VIES periods to let you concentrate on business.
Services.text6: No business can operate without proper contracts for every aspect – Documents for Websites, NDA, Marketing Agreements, Consulting Agreements, Software Development Agreements, License Agreements, etc.
Services.text7: We can enhance your current corporate structure and offer tax planning & asset protection measures.
Services.text8: Intellectual property is a valuable asset for any IT company. With our help, you can protect your trademark or logo in your country or around the world.
Services.businessTitle: Do you want to take your business to the next level?
Services.businessText: We know from experience that it is important to clearly define the request -to provide the highest quality and timely service.

platformSection.sectionTitle: Easily track the process of creating and processing your tasks
platformSection.subText: Legal and financial health of your business at your finger TAPs. The one platform to manage and track all corporate and financial tasks of your business. Our solution helps organize all your corporate structures, documents, invoices, deadlines and alerts into one place.

process.text1: We are open for a call or a chat session. It is important for us to immerse ourselves in the needs of your business.
process.text2: Each offer is done with an individual approach and attention to your budget and time estimates
process.text3: You may count on transparent information about further steps and an action plan.
process.text4: Of course, we would need your engagement in the project, but we are going to take the hassle and minimize your attention and time required for that.
process.title5: You get the full kit in full confidentiality
process.text5: We send you all the documents and information required for your business strictly according to your instructions
process.text6: We're here to help once you have any legal or financial questions. Our team can be outsourced as your in-house legal department.

Benefits.text1: Our team has an extensive experience with legal and financial structuring of IT businesses, so you can trust us to provide expert guidance and support
Benefits.text2: We understand that every IT business is unique, which is why we offer customized solutions tailored to your specific needs and goals.
Benefits.text3: We believe that starting a business shouldn't break the bank, which is why we offer affordable pricing options
Benefits.text4: We're dedicated to achieving results for our clients, whether that means successfully registering a company or protecting your IP from infringement

reviewSection.sectionText2: We know from experience that it is important to plan the budget both for IT startups and big stable businesses.

Benefits.text1: Great company. The best service. I have been working with this company for 2 years and I am always satisfied. Thank you Taxus for an amazing experience and great service.
Benefits.text2: Great communication, great quality of work. Very good understanding of legal issues cross border especially regarding International e-commerce businesses
Benefits.text3: Outstanding and highly recommended! We were able to accomplish exactly what we needed, in a short time period. Above and beyond, exceeded our expectations. AAA+++

aboutPage.pageTitle: Welcome to Taxus, your trusted partner in bespoke business solutions for the IT industry
aboutPage.pageSubText: With a perfect blend of legal, financial, and marketing expertise, we offer a one-stop-shop service that ranges from company registration to contract drafting.
aboutPage.pageEndText: Your gateway to easy international business set up

pageSubItems.text1: Our expertise covers a broad range of areas, including corporate law, intellectual property, banking and finance, and international IT business.
pageSubItems.text2: Our team is composed of professionals with diverse backgrounds, including lawyers, business consultants, and finance experts. This multidisciplinary approach allows us to provide a comprehensive and integrated service to our clients.
pageSubItems.text3: We work with businesses of all sizes, from startups to multinational corporations, and provide customized solutions to meet their specific needs.

aboutSectionIndustries.IndustriesSubText: At Taxus, we understand that every IT business is unique, and that’s why we provide tailor-made solutions that perfectly fit the needs of our clients

IndustriesSubItems.text1: Clients in the e-commerce industry often need assistance with company formation, setting up payment processing systems, drafting terms and conditions, and navigating consumer protection laws.
IndustriesSubItems.text2: Fintech clients often require help with company formation, licensing and regulatory compliance, and intellectual property protection. They may also need assistance with contract drafting and negotiation, as well as fundraising and investment advice.
IndustriesSubItems.text3: Clients in the software development industry often require assistance with intellectual property protection, licensing agreements, and contract negotiation. They may also need help with company formation and business account opening.
IndustriesSubItems.text4: Clients in the cryptocurrency industry require assistance with licensing, regulatory compliance, intellectual property protection, and contract negotiation. They may also need help with company formation and fundraising advice.

aboutSectionAwards.sectionTitle: We develop professionally to meet all the needs of our clients

aboutSectionHistory.sectionSubText: Taxus was founded in 2018 by a team of professionals with extensive experience in legal and financial accompaniment of different types of IT business. Our team has a combined experience of over 15 years, gathering trusted and professional advisors in legal, financial and marketing spheres. Since our founding, we have helped numerous clients establish and grow their online businesses, providing expert guidance and solutions to meet their unique needs.
aboutSectionHistory.sectionSubText2: Our goal is to be a trusted partner to our clients, working closely with them to understand their unique challenges and goals, and providing tailored solutions that deliver real results. We believe that our approach to legal technology should be an enabler for business growth, and we are passionate about helping our clients harness its power.

aboutBenefitsSubItems.text1: Our expertise is tailored to the unique needs of the IT industry, with a focus on providing practical solutions, not just consultations.
aboutBenefitsSubItems.text2: We combine legal, financial, and industry knowledge to deliver comprehensive and effective services.
aboutBenefitsSubItems.text3: Confidentiality and security are paramount to us, and we take all necessary measures to ensure the protection of your sensitive information.
aboutBenefitsSubItems.text4: At Taxus, we believe in building strong and lasting relationships with our clients based on trust, honesty, and transparency.

bankingSectionCards.aboutCardsTitle: Take control over your finances effortlessly with Taxus Banking

aboutCardsSubItems.text1: Your Business Account, wherever you are
aboutCardsSubItems.text4: Create cardholders and issue your new cards!

bankingSectionOffer.text1: Get your own IBAN accounts to easily manage your everyday
bankingSectionOffer.text2: Enjoy the convenience of online banking without ever needing to visit a branch.
bankingSectionOffer.text3: Get your account number immediately and start managing your finances without delay
bankingSectionOffer.text4: Easily handle multiple currencies in a single account, perfect for global transactions and international customers

bankingSectionPayments.aboutPaymentsTitle: Experience the ease and efficiency of managing your global finances
bankingSectionPayments.aboutPaymentsSubText: Your gateway to seamless international business transactions

aboutPaymentsSubItems.text1: Send and receive EUR instantly with the SEPA network.
aboutPaymentsSubItems.text2: We offer fast, secure, and transparent cross-border transfers through the SWIFT network, the global standard for international money transfers.
aboutPaymentsSubItems.text3: Reduce costs and streamline transactions with bulk payments.
aboutPaymentsSubItems.text4: Buy, sell, and transfer foreign currencies conveniently.
aboutPaymentsSubItems.text5: Effortless transactions in GBP, leveraging Faster Payments, CHAPS, and Direct Debits

bankingSectionPrivate.aboutPrivateSubTitle: Taxus Law & Finance is pleased to offer its business clients an exclusive service – Private Banking. This personalized, closed banking service is available only to individuals and stakeholders associated with businesses that Taxus Banking services.

aboutPrivateSubItems.text1: Available only to individuals and stakeholders associated with businesses serviced by Taxus Banking.
aboutPrivateSubItems.text2: Tailored banking solutions to meet your unique financial needs.
aboutPrivateSubItems.text3: Access to a dedicated banking team for personalized assistance.
aboutPrivateSubItems.text4: High-level security measures to protect your financial information.
aboutPrivateSubItems.text5: Streamlined management of your financial activities with ease and efficiency.

bankingSectionEscrow.aboutEscrowSubTitle: Ensure peace of mind for your business transactions with Taxus Business Escrow our secure escrow service. Here's how it works:
bankingSectionEscrow.aboutEscrowSubText: With Taxus Business Escrow, you can conduct business with confidence, knowing that your funds are protected every step of the way.

aboutEscrowSubItems.text1: Acts as a neutral intermediary, safeguarding both the buyer and seller in a transaction.
aboutEscrowSubItems.text2: Your funds are held securely by Taxus until the seller fulfills their obligations as outlined in the agreement.
aboutEscrowSubItems.text3: Once proof of shipment is verified, Taxus promptly releases your payment to the seller.

SectionPartnerSubItems.text1: Easily obtain unique account numbers to efficiently manage your finances.
SectionPartnerSubItems.text2: Manage funds in multiple currencies with our convenient multi-currency accounts.
SectionPartnerSubItems.text3: Send and receive cross-border payments easily via SWIFT and SEPA.
SectionPartnerSubItems.text4: Convert currencies at competitive rates to optimize your financial transactions.
SectionPartnerSubItems.text5: Establish multi-level account structures to suit your specific needs and organizational hierarchy.
SectionPartnerSubItems.text6: Simplify the process of receiving payments with our upcoming payment collection feature.
